data.enText: to help sb to do sth
We'll do all we can to assist you.

data.chText: 我们将帮你找个住的地方。
data.enText: We will assist you in finding somewhere to live.

data.chText: 该剧由迈克∙约翰逊导演，沙伦∙盖尔为助理导演。
data.enText: The play was directed by Mike Johnson, assisted by Sharon Gale.

data.chText: 有两个人正配合警方的询问。
data.enText: Two men are assisting the police with their enquiries (= are being questioned by the police) .

data.chText: 成人重返劳工市场的辅导班

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.enText: a course to assist adults to return to the labour market

data.chText: 凡愿协助者可拨此号码联系。
data.enText: Anyone willing to assist can contact this number.

data.chText: 我们正寻找愿意协助该团体工作的人。
data.enText: We are looking for people who would be willing to assist in the group's work.
to help sth to happen more easily
activities that will assist the decision-making process
an action in hockey , baseball , etc. in which a player helps another player on the same team to score a goal or point

simple_means.memory_skill: as 加强 + sist 站立 → 站起来帮助别人 → 帮助

ex.chText: 我帮她把行李箱拎上了楼。
ex.enText: I helped her to carry the suitcase up the stairs.

ex.chText: 你的建议对我们帮助很大。
ex.enText: Your suggestion helped us a lot.

synonyms.bx: 最普通用词，指积极地为他人提供物质、精神或其他方面的帮助，主语可以是人或物。

ex.chText: 难民们得到了联合国的援助。
ex.enText: The refugees were aided by the UN.

ex.chText: 我们帮他一起照看孩子。
ex.enText: We aided him in looking after his children.

synonyms.bx: 较正式用词，多指提供经济上或其他急需的帮助，强调帮助有困难的弱者，主语通常是人，常与介词 in/with 连用。

ex.chText: 他受聘协助开发新设备。
ex.enText: He was employed to assist in the development of new equipment.

ex.chText: 一组护士协助医生施行手术。
ex.enText: A team of nurses assisted the doctor with the operation.

synonyms.bx: 尤指起协助的作用，多用于帮助他人学习、工作或研究，常与介词 in/with 连用。

tr: (sports) the act of enabling another player to make a good play
the activity of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort or purpose
example: he gave me an assist with the housework
rescue party went to their aid

tr: act as an assistant in a subordinate or supportive function
work for or be a servant to
example: She attends the old lady in the wheelchair
Can you wait on our table, please?
The minister served the King for many years
Everyone helped out during the earthquake
Can you help me carry this table?
She never helps around the house

value.def: If you assist someone, you help them to do a job or task by doing part of the work for them.

example.ex: Julia was assisting him to prepare his speech...
example.tran: 朱莉娅正在帮他准备讲演稿。

example.ex: The family decided to assist me with my chores...
example.tran: 全家人决定帮助我做家务。

example.ex: Dr Amid was assisted by a young Asian nurse.
example.tran: 阿米德医生的助手是一位年轻的亚裔护士。

value.def: If you assist someone, you give them information, advice, or money.

example.ex: The public is urgently requested to assist police in tracing this man...
example.tran: 紧急要求公众帮助警方追踪此人。

example.ex: Foreign Office officials assisted with transport and finance problems...
example.tran: 外交部官员帮助解决运输和经费问题。

example.ex: The Authority will provide a welfare worker to assist you.
example.tran: 当局会派一名义工来帮助你。

value.tran: （提供信息、意见或金钱）帮助，援助

value.def: If something assists in doing a task, it makes the task easier to do.

example.ex: ...a chemical that assists in the manufacture of proteins...
example.tran: 有助于生成蛋白质的一种化学物质

example.ex: Here are some good sources of information to assist you in making the best selection...
example.tran: 这里是一些有价值的信息来源，可以帮助你作出最佳选择。

example.ex: Salvage operations have been greatly assisted by the good weather conditions.
example.tran: 天公作美，这大大促进了救援行动的顺利进行。

trans: 泊车辅助系统；自动泊车辅助系统；停车辅助；停车辅助系统；自动停车辅助系统
车道偏离警示系统；车道偏移警示系统；车道保持辅助功能；车道辅助
经美国国际支援服务；通知美国国际支援服务
代码辅助；智能提示；代码协助；代码自动提示功能

partsOfSpeech.dec: as 加强 + sist 站立 → 站起来帮助别人 → 帮助
assist 帮助 + ant 表人 → 助手
con 共同 + sist 站立 → 站到一起 → 由…组成
con 共同 + sist 站立 + ence 表状态 → 坚定地站在一起 → 坚固性
de 加强 + sist 站立 → 站着不动 → 停止
ex 使… + ist〔= sist〕站立 → 使立足 → 存在
exist 存在 + ence 性质，状态，行为 → 存在
in 使… + sist 站立 → 一直站着 → 坚持
insist 坚持 + ence 性质，状态，行为 → 坚持
ir 不 + resist 反抗 + ible 可…的 → 不可反抗的
per 自始至终 + sist 站立 → 始终站着 → 坚持到底
persist 坚持到底 + ent 具有…性质的，关于…的 → 坚持的；顽固的
re 反 + sist 站立 → 站在对面 → 对立
resist 反抗 + ance 状态，性质，状况 → 反抗；抵抗力
sub 下 + sist 站立 → 站下去 → 坚持活下去 → 生存
subsist 生存 + ence 表状态 → 生存

rootsaffixes.indicate: 等加在同辅音字母的词根前, 表加强
rootsaffixes.title: ab-, ac-, af-, ag-, ap-, ar-, as-, at-

partsOfSpeech.dec: ab 表加强 + brev 短 + iate 使… → 使一再变短 → 缩写
ac 表加强 + celer 速度 + ate 使… → 加快速度 → 加速
ac 表加强 + cent 唱歌 + uate 使… → 不停地唱 → 强调
ac 表加强 + company 伙伴 → 陪伴
ac 表加强 + cumul 堆积 + ate 做，造成，使… → 不断堆积 → 积累
af 表加强 + fili 子女 + ation 表结果 → 成为子女 → 入会
ag 表加强 + glomer 球状物 + ate 做，造成，使… → 成球状 → 成团
ag 表加强 + grand 大 + ize 使… → 一再大 → 扩大
ag 表加强 + grav 重 + ate 做，造成，使… →〔病〕加重 → 恶化
ag 表加强 + gress 行走 + ion 动作或状态 → 往前走 → 进攻
ap 表加强 + peas 平和 + e → 使〔人〕心态平和 → 抚慰
ap 表加强 + plaus 鼓掌 + e → 鼓掌
ap 表加强 + point 指 → 指定
ap 表加强 + preci 价值 + ate 做，造成，使… → 一再指出价值 → 欣赏
ar 表加强 + range 列 → 成列 → 安排
ar 表加强 + rest 休息 → 强制休息 → 逮捕
as 表加强 + sault 跳 → 跳起来〔争球〕→ 进攻
as 表加强 + sid 坐 + uous …的 → 一再坐着〔学习〕→ 勤奋的
as 表加强 + simil 一样 + ate 做，造成，使… → 成为相同 → 同化
as 表加强 + sist 站 → 站在一起 → 帮助
as 表加强 + soci 社会 + ate 做，造成，使… → 成为一个社会 → 联合
as 表加强 + sure 确定 → 一再确定 → 肯定
at 表加强 + tach 钉 → 牢牢钉上 → 附上
at 表加强 + tain 拿住 → 获得
at 表加强 + test 试验 → 一再试验 → 证实
at 表加强 + tract 拉 → 不断拉〔眼球〕→ 吸引
